body_html:
Thanks for the report @iron9light , I'm guessing you're talking about the path size limitations described in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/fileio/naming-a-file#maximum-path-length-limitation ?

The TensorFlow maintainers are unlikely to have the cycles to investigate a fix for this in the short term, so I'm marking this as "Contributions Welcome" in case anyone else in the community would like to give it a shot.

Thanks!

body:
Thanks for the report @iron9light , I'm guessing you're talking about the path size limitations described in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/fileio/naming-a-file#maximum-path-length-limitation ?

The TensorFlow maintainers are unlikely to have the cycles to investigate a fix for this in the short term, so I'm marking this as "Contributions Welcome" in case anyone else in the community would like to give it a shot.

Thanks!
